short_summary: Quantity x 1 Remote Control Mower and Trailer
description: A Remote Control Mower and Trailer, for use in mowing lawns at a military base.
full_summary:
[**Title**]
=================

Remote Control Mower and Trailer Purchase

[**Reference and Solicitation Information**]
-----------------------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: PW-23-01025107
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8476-236669/B
*   **Publication Date**: February 8, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

[**Procurement Details**]
-------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to procure Qty 1× Remote Control Mower and Trailer, along with associated Integrated Logistic Support (ILS) deliverables, for delivery to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton, Ontario. The expected delivery date is 120 days after contract award.

[**Background and Cancellation**]
-------------------------------

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number W8476-236669/A dated November 15, 2022, with a closing date of December 29, 2022. Debriefing or feedback sessions will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who participated in the previous solicitation.

[**Important Notes**]
--------------------

No security requirements are associated with this procurement. All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Government of Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

[**Attachments and Contact Information**]
------------------------------------------

Please find the relevant documents attached. For any questions or concerns, please contact:

*   Genevieve Roach, Contracting Authority
*   genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca

[**Government of Canada Documents and Processes**]
-------------------------------------------------

This procurement is being conducted in accordance with the Government of Canada's Trade Agreement and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The tender process is open to all qualified suppliers. A comprehensive quality assurance process will be implemented to ensure that the requirements of the solicitation are met. The Department of National Defence reserves the right to consider late bids, but such bids will only be accepted in exceptional circumstances.

The entire set of documents can be found on the Canadabuys website.

 

[**Adding some of the vital attachments**]

Attachments:
